column6:
This condo is conveniently located in the Galleria shopping area one of the most sought after destinations of Houston.
Here you are within walking distance of popular bars, restaruants,art and culture, night life, unique boutiques, upscale shopping and so much more.
Staying in the heart of the Houston Galleria area you can experience an unparralleled lifestyle of comfort and convience. 
My place is good for couples, solo adventures, and business travelers
